name: Connect fan with creator:GROOVE TAP
description:
Realize your dream games and music!
GROOVE TAP connects fans with creators.

This is a music arcade game with music and illustrations provided by creator artists.

Enjoy original music and illustrations the creator artists made through the game and become a fan of them through various mini-games.


◆ About game
The objective of the TAP mode is to 'tap' or 'hold' when the timeline moving up and down overlaps with the cubics.

We also provide information on various musics and connections between artists and fans, such as enabling presenting artists' image and music through mission.
